Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity

Interface SceneChild

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NodeProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Entity, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, JavaFXEntity, RectangleEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity
    public interface SceneChild
extends NodeProvider
    A SceneChild is part of a YaegerScene and has thus access to width and height of the YaegerScene it is part of.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default double getSceneHeight()
      Return the height of the Scene that this Entity is part of.
      default double getSceneWidth()
      Return the width of the Scene that this Entity is part of.

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.NodeProvider

        getGameNode, toBack, toFront

    • Method Detail

      • getSceneWidth

        default double getSceneWidth()
        Return the width of the Scene that this Entity is part of.
        Returns:
        the width of this Scene as a double

      • getSceneHeight

        default double getSceneHeight()
        Return the height of the Scene that this Entity is part of.
        Returns:
        the height of this Scene as a double
